extendedInfo.description: ** This is a web launcher that allows you to put a shortcut to dubizzle on your homescreen***we are working on a native app that will be launched soon and automatically updated from this app*Need to find something on the move? Not a problem with the free dubizzle UAE app for your android device! Download the number one classifieds website app to buy a house, sell a car or find a job in UAE. Buying and selling is now at your fingertips! Sell your old home furniture and get a new one, find the latest electronics, the coolest smartphones and iPads. Never miss a listing with our apartment finder â we identify the newest homes and properties for rent and for sale that match your search criteria and notify you as soon as theyâre available.Need to buy a new car? Need to add inventory to your dealership? If so, check our autos section to find new or used cars for sale that meet your search criteria.Thinking about a career change? Find jobs in UAE and apply today for free! Search for the latest job offers and vacancies and find what suits your expertise.Features:- Sell your unwanted items quickly and easily. You can even use photos from your phone!- Manage your listing while on the move.- Customize your searches with our advanced searches.- Share your ads directly with your friends on facebook and twitter.- Find local listings in your city and call or email the seller instantly.

reviews.title: App for website
reviews.comment: App just loads the Web page, not easier to navigate than the mobile Web version and a pointless app. A custom app interface would be nice
reviews.author: Fabio Troiano

reviews.title: Great App, still missing some features
reviews.comment: Hey guys the glad that you have released a fully functioning app. Looks great and is very easy to use. Still there are some features which are missing like the advanced search feature of specifying the neighborhoods or the locality. I hope you guys will include this in your next update.
reviews.author: royster cabral

reviews.title: Irritating app. Needs some work to make it a better experience.
reviews.comment: Everytime you turn or tilt your Phone/Tablet, the app reloads which is quite irritating. Also, when you go back from a certain ad the whole list appears from the beginning and you spend time and data to get back to where you were. Without these glitches could be a be a nice app but until then is simply irritating to regular users.
reviews.author: Zeeshan Khan

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Thank you dubizzle for making my life easier :)
reviews.author: Razan Al-Masri

reviews.title: Just a browser
reviews.comment: App is just a browser for the mobile website. No new features to make the mobile experience better.
reviews.author: Kushan Wijendra

reviews.title: Very nice app...
reviews.comment: Able to perform all functions just like the desktop and smoothly as well.. :-)
reviews.author: Surya Nair

reviews.title: Needs adjustment
reviews.comment: Nice but. Each time inlook at a.propert then go back to the search it loses its place and i have to scroll down and reload the search over again. Would b nice if when i.go back i start from where i left off.
reviews.author: Miss Cleopatra

reviews.title: What a crap
reviews.comment: This app loads mobile version. Why do you think someone needs dedicated app for that?
reviews.author: Teodor Mascarado

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Thanks to all staff of dubizzel coz i found my job via dubizzel.now jz stay at your home r where ever you are find your dream job via dubizzel.tnx
reviews.author: Imran Khan

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: This app is just a link to the website and it needs much more improvement.
reviews.author: Ahmad Al-Ramadan

reviews.title: Just a mobile website
reviews.comment: App is just a webview. Very disappointing. Please design a proper native app for android . I have no idea how this is rated 4 stars
reviews.author: Thomas Binu

reviews.title: This is not an app
reviews.comment: This is just the mobile version of the website running inside a frame of an App.   Can\'t believe you would try to fool your customers like this.
reviews.author: Stephan Botha

reviews.title: Waste of a download
reviews.comment: Takes you to the website. Ridiculous
reviews.author: Abbas Al Lawati

reviews.title: not a mobile app!
reviews.comment: This is just the existing website embedded in an app. No point. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Andrew Mackay

reviews.comment: Very weak app could be a lot better
reviews.author: M. Daff

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Dubizzle never ceases to amaze me!! Thank you for the excellent job now we can check for adverts on the move:)
reviews.author: Washington Murisa

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: It\'s running by explorer inside frame its not even application....!!!!
reviews.author: Bashar Bokho
